MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA6 postcode area of Ayr. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.15pm to carry out repair work safely on our equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.44pm on the 23rd December 2020.
